channel.title: R Markdown on Christine Do
channel.description: Recent content in R Markdown on Christine Do

item.title: Hi!
item.description: Hi! My name is Christine Do and I am a 4th year Biology major with a Business Minor.

item.title: Introduction to Python
item.description: During the majority of my computational biology class, we worked on R studio. However, the final week of classes we were introduced to Python. Python is a very useful programming language that can be used to solve, collect, and interpret problems and data. In the example below, I am telling the computer to store “c” as “HI! This is python”. Then, I am telling the computer to print what is “c” is.
